unnormalised: OMG, mazyen mavshechea lognachi planning ek full-time nokri zalea bhaxen zata! Baaraat exact 7:30 PM-ak 12/12/2024-ak pavunk zai, punn Indian Standard Time mahit asun, hanv ek "flexible" 2 voranchi buffer dovortam. Panditjik pon'ndi felyeanchea adhim 4:00 AM-amchea adhim zaunk zai, mhunn sanglyan, tea khatir soglleanim chai ani Red Bull vapurun dovrat! Ani "sangeetchi toyari 3 satte adhim suru zata" tacher ulo divonkai nakat – mhojek hea logna uprant suttkechi goroz asa!
normalised: Oh my G-D, mazyā cousinitlā lagna plan korpāk ek full-time kam' zātā mhunn distā! Bārāt d'holā saāt teesa minuteān dhāktobrāk barabar bara December don hāzār āni chovisāk yeunk zāy, punn Bhāratiy Standard Time mhālleānak lagun, hanv "flexible" don horāncho buffer ād'd korunk āssā. Panditji feren sākāli chār vaje meren sampunk zāy mhonn sangtāt, mhonnun sokāllimim chay āni Red Bull gheun thevcheā bhār! Āni "sangeet prep tin sat'te adim suru zātā" vishim mhālunk naka – hanv lagna zātā teāntar ek vacation gheun zāunk zāy!
